name: adrenaline-orb
effect: Makes wild Pokémon more likely to summon allies. Held: increases the holder’s Speed by one stage when affected by Intimidate.
short_effect: Makes wild Pokémon more likely to summon allies. Held: increases the holder’s Speed by one stage when affected by Intimidate.

flavor_text.sun_moon: Using it makes wild Pokémon more likely to call for help. If held by a Pokémon, it boosts Speed when intimidated. It can be used only once.
flavor_text.ultra_sun_ultra_moon: Using it makes wild Pokémon call for help a number of times. If held by a Pokémon, it boosts Speed when intimidated. It can be used only once.
flavor_text.lets_go_pikachu_lets_go_eevee: Using it makes wild Pokémon call for help a number of times. If held by a Pokémon, it boosts Speed when intimidated. It can be used only once.
